project.name: POC_DataCloud
project.title: Generated by Talend Cloud Data Management Platform

job.name: ext_src_to_stg_FACT_MSEG
job.description: Extract data from MSEG SAP table

column.name: Query
column.value: "SELECT SAPSR3.MSEG.MANDT, SAPSR3.MSEG.MBLNR, SAPSR3.MSEG.MJAHR, SAPSR3.MSEG.ZEILE, SAPSR3.MSEG.BWART, SAPSR3.MSEG.MATNR, SAPSR3.MSEG.WERKS, SAPSR3.MSEG.LGORT, SAPSR3.MSEG.CHARG, SAPSR3.MSEG.SOBKZ, SAPSR3.MSEG.LIFNR, SAPSR3.MSEG.KUNNR, SAPSR3.MSEG.SHKZG, SAPSR3.MSEG.WAERS, SAPSR3.MSEG.DMBTR, SAPSR3.MSEG.BNBTR, SAPSR3.MSEG.MENGE, SAPSR3.MSEG.MEINS, SAPSR3.MSEG.ERFMG, SAPSR3.MSEG.ERFME, SAPSR3.MSEG.EBELN, SAPSR3.MSEG.EBELP, SAPSR3.MSEG.SGTXT, SAPSR3.MSEG.WEMPF, SAPSR3.MSEG.KOSTL, SAPSR3.MSEG.AUFNR, SAPSR3.MSEG.BUKRS, SAPSR3.MSEG.GRUND, SAPSR3.MSEG.SAKTO, SAPSR3.MSEG.BUSTW, SAPSR3.MSEG.\"/CWM/MENGE\", SAPSR3.MSEG.\"/CWM/MEINS\" FROM SAPSR3.MSEG WHERE MANDT = '200' and MJAHR >='"+context.last_loaded_year+"'"

column.name: Trim column
column.value: [{SCHEMA_COLUMN=MANDT, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=MBLNR, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=MJAHR, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=ZEILE, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=BWART, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=MATNR, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=WERKS, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=LGORT, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=CHARG, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=SOBKZ, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=LIFNR, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=KUNNR, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=SHKZG, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=WAERS, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=DMBTR, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=BNBTR, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=MENGE, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=MEINS, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=ERFMG, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=ERFME, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=EBELN, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=EBELP, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=SGTXT, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=WEMPF, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=KOSTL, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=AUFNR, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=BUKRS, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=GRUND, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=SAKTO, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=BUSTW, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=_CWM_MENGE, TRIM=false}, {SCHEMA_COLUMN=_CWM_MEINS, TRIM=false}]

column.name: Full SQL query string
column.value: "select coalesce(to_variant(TO_CHAR(LAST_COMPLETITION, 'YYYY'))::STRING,'2023') as last_loaded_year from DB_CAMPOFRIO.CNF.PROCESS_CONTROL where SOURCE = 'SAP' and OBJECT_NAME = 'MSEG' and ELT_PHASE = 'STG'"

column.name: Allow Snowflake to convert columns and tables to uppercase (Note: Unquoted identifiers should match the Snowflake Identifier Syntax.)
Use existing database schema as the dynamic schema
Schema
column.value: {"type":"record","name":"DYNAMIC","fields":[{"name":"number_of_rows_updated","type":{"type":"string","java-class":"java.math.BigDecimal"},"talend.field.length":"19","talend.field.precision":"0","talend.field.dbType":-5,"talend.field.dbColumnName":"number of rows updated"},{"name":"number_of_multi_joined_rows_updated","type":{"type":"string","java-class":"java.math.BigDecimal"},"talend.field.length":"19","talend.field.precision":"0","talend.field.dbType":-5,"talend.field.dbColumnName":"number of multi-joined rows updated"}]}

column.name: Query
column.value: "update DB_CAMPOFRIO.CNF.PROCESS_CONTROL set LAST_COMPLETITION = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where SOURCE = 'SAP' and OBJECT_NAME = 'MSEG' and ELT_PHASE = 'STG'"

column.name: schemaFlow.schema
